verses.verse: Then <WG3767> Jesus <WG2424> six <WG1803> days <WG2250> before <WG4253> the passover <WG3957> came <WG2064> to Bethany, <WG963> where <WG3699> Lazarus <WG2976> was, which <WG3588> had been dead, <WG2348> whom <WG3739> he raised <WG1453> from the dead. <WG3498>

Much <WG4183> people <WG3793> of the Jews <WG2453> therefore <WG3767> knew <WG1097> that he was there: <WG1563> and they came <WG2064> not for Jesus' <WG2424> sake only, <WG3440> but that they might see <WG1492> Lazarus <WG2976> also, <WG2532> whom <WG3739> he had raised <WG1453> from the dead. <WG3498>

If <WG1437> any <WG5100> man serve <WG1247> me, let him follow <WG190> me; and where <WG3699> I am, <WG1510> there <WG1563> shall also <WG2532> my servant <WG1249> be: if <WG1437> any <WG5100> man serve <WG1247> me, him will my Father <WG3962> honor. <WG5091>

Father, <WG3962> glorify <WG1392> your name. <WG3686> Then <WG3767> came <WG2064> there a voice <WG5456> from heaven, <WG3772> saying, I have both <WG2532> glorified <WG1392> it, and will glorify <WG1392> it again. <WG3825>

Now <WG3568> is the judgment <WG2920> of this <WG5127> world: <WG2889> now <WG3568> shall the prince <WG758> of this <WG5127> world <WG2889> be cast <WG1544> out.
And I, if <WG1437> I be lifted <WG5312> up from the earth, <WG1093> will draw <WG1670> all <WG3956> men to me.
